fields.label: About Login
fields.message: Gameful Me does not use the default Login and Registration. It has login and registration built into the frontend. The default Wordpress login and registration is still available. Security Tip Use a plugin to change the login url of Wordpress. This makes it harder for bots to find it. One popular option is WPS Hide Login. Social Login You can use a plugin to allow for registration and login with Google or Social Media accounts. This is particularly useful if you are using Google Apps for Education. Wordpress Social Login has been tested with Game On.
